data.client_settings: Windows Desktop Client Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 15665, Version Hash: 04bf7d3b2396890be3b25fd50c2465f9c3703
data.actual_result: Within the first few incoming messages the message view will pin at its current location and messages pile up below fold
data.expected_result: On non-DPI scaled monitors the message view stays anchored at the bottom displaying most recent messages
data.short_description: Message view does not stay anchored at bottom on DPI scaled monitors
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an active channel in the desktop client - Drag discord over to monitor with DPI scaling active (if multi monitor) - Keep discord client in focus - Wait for message activity in channel and observe message view does not stay anchored to newest messages - Possibly related to bug 10266
